title: The Immortal Iron Fist, Vol. 1: The Last Iron Fist Story
description: "Danny Rand leads a double life. Raised in the mystical city of K'un-Lun, he fights on the side of good as the masked martial artist Iron Fist. As young corporate executive Daniel Rand, he reluctantly runs the multi-billion dollar Rand Corporation inherited from his late parents. Now, both of Danny's legacies are under attack. While the shadowy Wai-Go Industries attempts a hostile takeover ..., Iron Fist faces a sinister conspiracy that pits him against the terrorist hordes of Hydra ... guest-starring Daredevil ..."--Dust jacket.
author: Ed Brubaker
